description:
Yoshino tells Masamune exactly what happened in their past and then convinces him to stop Gasou from getting too close to Aki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anta Nanka Suki ni Naranai wa yo, Tonsoku
I`m Not Going to Fall in Love with You, Pig`s Foot
Je serai jamais amoureuse de toi. Tu t`es regardé, porcelet ?
あんたなんか好きにならないわよ, 豚足
